name: Atlas Reactor VR Character Viewer
description: Outwit to outlive in Atlas Reactor, the genre-breaking team tactics game coming soon from Trion Worlds.With the VR Character Viewer, you can check out all of Atlas’ most wanted Freelancers (and their skins, styles, and skills) in a revolutionary new way!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or greater Memory: 10 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Yes

reviews.review_text: its only a gimmick, but its very high quality vr and hey, its free, even if youre not into atlas reactor its fun to check out

As a free model and animation viewer, pretty cool!  + detailed models + very different models + great taunt voices + great animation * non-interactive apart from model/playback selection and playback options * I think some shots/abilities could be shown better (disappearing shots, jump animations while in place…) - sometimes too big/misplaced for small room scale - I had a stutter pretty much on every first animation play; not when playing an animation again
